name: Mystery Energy
effect:
This card can only be attached to {P} Pokémon. This card provides {P} Energy only while this card is attached to a {P} Pokémon.
The Retreat Cost of the Pokémon this card is attached to is {C}{C} less.
(If this card is attached to anything other than a {P} Pokémon, discard this card.)
author: 5ban Graphics
